  Retrieves details of an existing E2E DBaaS MariaDB instance.
---

# e2e_dbaas_mariadb (Data Source)

Provides information about an existing E2E DBaaS MariaDB cluster.

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->

```hcl
data "e2e_dbaas_mariadb" "example" {
  location    = "Delhi"
  project_id  = "your-project-id"    # Replace with your actual project ID
  id          = "your-cluster-id"    # Replace with the MariaDB cluster ID
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The unique ID of the MariaDB DBaaS cluster. To find the cluster ID, refer to our [API documentation](https://docs.e2enetworks.com/api/myaccount/#/paths/rds-cluster-Cluster_id-/get).
- `project_id` (String) The project ID under which the DBaaS cluster is created. See [API documentation](https://docs.e2enetworks.com/api/myaccount/#/paths/pbac-projects-header/get).
- `location` (String) The region where the MariaDB DBaaS is deployed (e.g., "Delhi").

### Read-Only

- `name` (String) Name of the MariaDB cluster.
- `database_id` (Number) Internal database ID inside the cluster.
- `database_name` (String) Name of the database.
- `database_user` (String) Username for accessing the database.
- `status` (String) Current status of the DBaaS cluster (e.g., "RUNNING", "STOPPED").
- `public_ip` (String) Public IP address assigned to the master node.
- `private_ip` (String) Private IP address of the master node.
- `is_public_ip_attached` (Boolean) Whether a public IP is currently attached.
- `disk` (String) Allocated disk size of the master node (e.g., "100 GB").
- `plan` (String) The plan associated with the cluster (e.g., "DBS.16GB").
- `software_version` (String) The MariaDB version deployed (e.g., "10.6").
- `parameter_group_id` (Number) ID of the parameter group attached to the database.
- `power_status` (String) Power state of the master node (e.g., "Running", "Stopped").
